text: aticcamarttappettirunnavar ahanta naticcirunnavareatu parayum: "alla, rappakalukalile ninnalute kutantrattinre phalamanit. nannal allahuve nisedhikkanum avanu samanmare sankalpikkanum ninnal kalpiccukeantirunna karyam orkkuka." avasanam siksa kanumpeal avar duhkham ullilealippikkum. satyanisedhikalute kaluttil nam kuccuvilannitum. avar pravartticcukeantirunnatinre pratiphalamalle avarkkuntavu
